db:abstract.db:para: Basic wheel mouse based input handler.
This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: InputHandler3D is the basic input handler for wheel mouse type of input devices.
See Q3DInputHandler documentation for more details.

db:section.db:title: [since QtDataVisualization 1.2] rotationEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies if this input handler allows graph rotation. Defaults to true.
This property was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtDataVisualization 1.2] selectionEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies if this input handler allows selection from the graph. Defaults to true.
This property was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtDataVisualization 1.2] zoomAtTargetEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies if zooming changes the camera target to the position of the input at the time of the zoom. Defaults to true.
This property was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtDataVisualization 1.2] zoomEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies if this input handler allows graph zooming. Defaults to true.
This property was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.2.
